result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kervin Jesus Pena Balbuena

records.addlTxt: Plea/sentencing hearing on January 23, 2023 at 09:30 am.

10:23 AM Defendant Kervin Jesus Pena Balbuena in court.  Attorney Luca Lopes Fagundes in court for Kervin Jesus Pena Balbuena.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin. Court questions where matter is at. Atty Fagundes indicates have an offer, blood panel results not in yet. Bond remains in effect.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 23, 2023 at 09:30 am.
Status conference on October 27, 2022 at 10:20 am.
Defense waives reading of Information and enters not guilty plea. Bond remains in effect.

2:20 PM Prosecuting attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Kervin Jesus Pena Balbuena in court.  Attorney Luca Lopes Fagundes in court for Kervin Jesus Pena Balbuena. Court questions where matter is at. Defense waives right to Prelim. Court questions defendant on waiver. Court finds waiver made freely and voluntarily, accepts waiver and binds over for trial. Court finds probable cause for bindover.
Status conference scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 10:20 am.
Status conference on July 11, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

2:55 PM Prosecuting attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Kervin Jesus Pena Balbuena in court.  Attorney Luca Lopes Fagundes in court for Kervin Jesus Pena Balbuena. Court reviews events in file, questions where matter is at. Atty Fagundes indicates waiting for offer and test results, requests a status.  Bond remains in effect.
Status conference scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Status conference on May 2, 2022 at 02:50 pm.

10:06 AM Prosecuting attorney Nicholas Paul Grode appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Kervin Jesus Pena Balbuena appeared in court, Attorney Luca Lopes Fagundes appeared in court for Kervin Jesus Pena Balbuena. Court reviews charge(s), max. penalties, right to counsel. Defense waives time limit for prelim, requests status date. Bond remains in effect.
Status conference scheduled for May 2, 2022 at 02:50 pm.

Adjustment Number: 22A 000186,
Payable Number: 99542,
Receipt Number: 22R 000482,
Amount: $20.00
$500 cash bond posted by Kervin Pena Balbuena

1:00PM  Kervin Pena Balbuena appeared in court via zoom from the Door County Jail, Colleen Nordin appeared in court for the state, Shannon Viel appeared in court for Kervin Pena Balbuena.  State gives incident report, potential charges. Court questions Defendant on address/employment history, reviews right to Counsel. Court finds probable cause, sets bond.

No contact direct or indirect with F.C.C. Do not operate a motor vehicle without a valid drivers license and subject to any conditions or restrictions on that license. Not to possess or consume any controlled substances without a valid prescription and then take only in the amount and frequency prescribed. Not to possess or use any drug paraphernalia.
